storyInfo: The Self-Salvation Corps successfully escapes under Siege's leadership, but the Sanguinarch of Vampires is hot on their heels.

attributes.content: They're still on our tails.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: You should go... someone of your station shouldn't risk her life for us...
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Fighter

attributes.content: Would you say the same if it was Allerdale or Clovisia?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: ...You're different.
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Fighter

attributes.content: Heads down.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Fighter

attributes.content: Siege's hammer swings through the air, barely missing the fighter's head.
A massive hole appears on the wall with the sound of bricks cracking. Within lies the severed hand of a Sarkaz caster, still holding his wand.
Different, am I?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: You... you...
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Fighter

attributes.content: Stay close. I'm not in the habit of slowing down my fights.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: We haven't shaken them yet.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: These Sarkaz are persistent.
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Fighter

attributes.content: Their uniform is the same, but the Sarkaz of Sudean are like children compared to these.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: They're different.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: What should we do? Keep making circles in the streets?
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Fighter

attributes.content: You used to sit in front of a desk, didn't you?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Huh? Yes, I was an accountant... why?
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Fighter

attributes.content: How did you travel? By car?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Er, yes...
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Fighter

attributes.content: Do you know how wide a Londinium alley is? How long it takes to run from one end of Wellington to the other? How many sewer entrances there are on each block?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: They do.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Who does?
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Fighter

attributes.content: Over here, Vina!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Target sighted!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Hostiles in the shadows!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: This way, Vina!
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: I hear explosions coming from the safehouse.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: The Corps fighters aren't moving quick enough. We have to cover their retreat.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Grr. This way!
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Siege!
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Dagda, what's the situation?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Clovisia evacuated with most of them. Allerdale...
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: ...I'm fine.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: You're hurt.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I can take care of myself.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: You should not have returned, Your Highness.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: They're inside.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Kill them all.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Forgive my bluntness, Siege, I don't think you should...
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: You don't think I should have come back either?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: No, I don't think you should be at front, by yourself.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Allow me to stand by your side, from time to time.
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Very well. Come forward, Dagda.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: You need to rest, Allerdale.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: The daughter of the Duke of Cumberland can't lose to the daughter of the Count of Manchester.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: I know Allerdale and Dagda better.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Then I'll stand by your side, as your friend, Allerdale.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: What about you, soldier? Can you stand?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Y-Yes...
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Fighter

attributes.content: Then grab your weapon and fight.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Londinium... this iron jungle belongs to us. It's time to show the Sarkaz who is hunter and who is hunted.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Your station won't save you, Aslan.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: We don't care.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: The Sarkaz future is now. You'll be buried with the past.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Wait...
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Look out! Ambush, behind the shelves!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: You're sharp.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Hey! Over here!
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: No, here!
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Do it, Siege!
attributes.name: Dagda

attributes.content: Now then.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Look out!
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Fighter

attributes.content: Flashy, but pointless.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Playtime's over. Drop your weapon and you can die a quick death.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Make things easier for both of us.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Sorry... I got careless.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: No need to apologize.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: The Sarkaz gazes at Siege, and Siege gazes at Allerdale.
She raises her hands slowly. Her hammer falls to the ground with a bang.
She winks at Allerdale, who raises the corner of her mouth.
Wait... wind? But we're indoors...
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior
Sarkaz Warrior
attributes.content: It's...

attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior
attributes.content: Damn it, it's Arts! Incoming!
attributes.joined: It's... Damn it, it's Arts! Incoming!

attributes.content: Vina, catch!
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Now then.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Gahâ€”!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Are you alright?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I'm in a good mood, at least.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: The warehouse is collapsing! Pull out! Surround them outside!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Your safehouse doesn't seem so solid.
attributes.name: Indra

attributes.content: Safehouses aren't meant to be impregnable fortresses.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Follow me.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: The hidden passage should be blocked under the rubble, but we need to up our pace.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Ugh...
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: You need to get your wounds wrapped, Allerdale.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I... I'm fine.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Dagda, take the fighter back to the Self-Salvation Corps camp. We'll split up.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Your Higâ€”Siege.
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Fighter

attributes.content: You showed your leadership. Now it's our turn to show you what we can do.
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Fighter

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Self-Salvation Corps Fighter

attributes.content: Where are you going?
attributes.name: Morgan

attributes.content: Allerdale's injuries can't wait. I'll find somewhere nearby...
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Wait, I remember this place...
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Surprised you still have an impression of this alley, Vina.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: That afternoon, when you brought back the Sighs of Kings, with them.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: ...What?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Nothing. Let's keep going.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: This path connects the palace to the ducal residence. Not many know of its existence.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: I have assurances from one whose word carries weight that Cumberland Manor will be safe until tomorrow.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Enough for us to get these little flesh wounds treated.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Vina...
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: You knew I was there?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I know what sounds I should hear from outside my room.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: My dear Lady Vina, staring at me won't heal the wounds on my back.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Would you kindly change the bandages?
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: ...Right.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Ugh...
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Sorry, was I too heavy-handed?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: It's nothing. I just let my guard down when there aren't so many eyes on me.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: You bled a lot... how many times did you get hit?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Most of them don't hurt anymore.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: If I reacted faster... maybe it would have saved you a scar.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Escaping from those fighters was no mean feat.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Besides, I've been wanting to thank you for days.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: You've helped the Corps a lot, and you even saved the old steam armor.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: I have a responsibility, Allerdale. I... I don't want to see you lose anything else.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Hah.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: No matter, Vina. If there's one thing I've learned over the years, it's that life usually doesn't go the way we want.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: If it did, we wouldn't be hiding in this dark, little room, and we wouldn't be sitting with a bunch of stinking bandages.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: We...
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Let me think... we'd be sitting in a garden, taking tea together, discussing poetry and the weather.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: We could go hunting. The alcornes are plentiful in the countryside this season. They run fast, but stop and stare when they see a crowd. Do you like hunting?
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: ...I don't know.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I've almost forgotten how it feels myself. But I'm guessing you don't like dancing, at least not at those onerous dance parties in the social season. I don't like them either.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: The dresses are so much stiffer than hunting attire, and so tight they rob you of your appetite for the banquet.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Ha, I can imagine.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: And...
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: I'm thinking the hunting outfit would look better on you.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Vina...
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Yes?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Perhaps... we should have seen more of each other. Much more.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Fate robbed us of a beautiful life, against our will.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Luckily, we still have the future...
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: What's the matter? You look surprised.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: ...I'm talking about the future.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: You don't do that often?
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Back when I was running for my life, I hardly ever thought about the future. The past was in my dreams, and the future... it was in a fog, where I couldn't see anything.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: This is not a flaw, Vina. It's a virtue.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Nobles like to talk about the future, but most of them are more concerned about the dinner menu.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: It's not because they've grown numb to life, but because they understand how precious the present is.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Like the present now?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Yes...
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Like the present now.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Ailshie.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Good morning, Lady Allerdale. Everything is in order.
attributes.name: Ailshie

attributes.content: The steam armor... why have you taken it out?
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: It's too big to take with us.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: ...Is that so?
attributes.name: Ailshie

attributes.content: Has Her Highness Alexandrina left?
attributes.name: Ailshie

attributes.content: Yes, she has her own mission.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Your injuries...
attributes.name: Ailshie

attributes.content: Are fine, thanks to Her Highness.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: I haven't seen you smile like this in a long time.
attributes.name: Ailshie

attributes.content: Am I being too calm before the storm?
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: It does bring back long-forgotten feelings to stand with Her Highness and the others.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: It's been some time since I encountered someone I could trust.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Her Highness Alexandrina saved this armor for you. I may be a lowly servant, but I feel a sense of gratitude.
attributes.name: Ailshie

attributes.content: It's the pride of Cumberland.
attributes.name: Ailshie

attributes.content: Pride...
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: The armor and your honored ancestors... I remember how you used to talk to them.
attributes.name: Ailshie

attributes.content: Children like to wallow in fantasy.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: But I learned, twenty-six years ago, that it's no hero, just a broken hunk of metal.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: We've all changed, yet the armor seems frozen in time.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Do you... like Her Highness Alexandrina?
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Her Highness is very kind. I've seen how she treats her fellows, eating the same food and sleeping in the same room.
attributes.name: Ailshie

attributes.content: She's not like most nobles. She doesn't see them as her servants, nor will she abandon them.
attributes.name: Ailshie

attributes.content: Victoria is fortunate.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: The heart of Her Highness is strong. Years of exile have not undermined her dignity and integrity.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: You said Victoria. What about yourself, my lady? What do you think of Her Highness?
attributes.name: Ailshie

attributes.content: I hope she has a bright future.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: So you...?
attributes.name: Ailshie

attributes.content: I got a letter last night. Two in the same day.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: She's... impatient.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: But you've reunited with Her Highness!
attributes.name: Ailshie

attributes.content: Do you remember how Her Highness came here with the Sighs of Kings, twenty-six years ago? It must've been a sign, and its portents might come true very soon!
attributes.name: Ailshie

attributes.content: We've waited for so long, Miss. You could...
attributes.name: Ailshie

attributes.text: You will meet Vina again, someday.'

attributes.content: He...
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: I've long since given up waiting, Ailshie.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: How long has it been since Jim left?
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: He returned home to County Peninsula the year after the incident.
attributes.name: Ailshie

attributes.content: ...Twenty-five years. We haven't had a gardener for a quarter century.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: I used to love the bushes that grew there. They tripped me from time to time, but the tiny golden flowers that bloomed from them were so beautiful.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: The first batch all died the winter after Jim left.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Mother sent people all around and learned that it was the noblest breed from Minos. The money it took to buy those seeds would have fed an ordinary family of Londiniers for half a decade.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Your garden remains beautiful, even without that particular kind of bush.
attributes.name: Ailshie

attributes.content: I tried, Ailshie. We all tried. You toiled tirelessly, summer and winter, in order to keep the garden in good shape.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: But without those seeds, our garden would never return to its former glory.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: I sent her a letter the fifth New Year's Day after Dad died.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Her reply included the seeds that House Cumberland could no longer afford.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Ailshie... we've always been living like this.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: If the Duke was here...
attributes.name: Ailshie

attributes.content: ...She always had tricks up her sleeve.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: No, my lady, I meant your father.
attributes.name: Ailshie

attributes.content: Father... father.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: I can hardly recall his voice now.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Perhaps it's only in this garden that I... that I remember how he held my hand, taught my how to swing a sword, knocked me down, then picked me back up and sat me on his shoulder...
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: I wanted to preserve them, many years ago, Ailshie. I tried everything I could. The garden, the armor... and the shadow of my father.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: But there is nothing worth less than 'want'.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: I remember how I wanted to become a Steam Knight when I was little.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Ailshie. Sometimes... just sometimes, I think...
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Growing up is such a cruel thing, isn't it?
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: With the exception of a lucky few, we all become tired and unremarkable adults.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Always treading carefully, not daring to speak our minds, grasping at straws when the waves are rough, and never letting go of the ones we find.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: What did you want to be when you were little, Ailshie? Not the servant of a fallen house, surely?
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: No, it's an honor to be by your side...
attributes.name: Ailshie

attributes.content: I want the truth.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Well... I suppose... I listened to a lot of bard's tales when I was little.
attributes.name: Ailshie

attributes.content: Ah. Ailshie the Bard.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Please don't tease me.
attributes.name: Ailshie

attributes.content: Growing up means toppling, crushing, turning to dust the possibilities that we thought were within our reach when we were little.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: And here we are.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Can I preserve House Cumberland's glory? It passed beyond my reach a long time ago.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: I, Allerdale, am who I am now.
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: ...But even you cannot say who Allerdale will be, can you?
attributes.name: Ailshie

attributes.content: Will be...?
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: I'm old, Miss. I couldn't squeeze a tune out of an instrument, even if I had the chance.
attributes.name: Ailshie

attributes.content: But you promised me.
attributes.name: Ailshie

attributes.content: Maybe you thought it was just a childish fancy.
attributes.name: Ailshie

attributes.content: But I've always believed that you could do it.
attributes.name: Ailshie

attributes.content: To be a Steam Knight greater than Charles Lynch, greater than any of your ancestors.
attributes.name: Ailshie

attributes.content: You'll do it for me, won't you?
attributes.name: Ailshie

attributes.content: Enough, Ailshie! She wouldn't permit...
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Then what do you want to do?
attributes.name: Ailshie

attributes.content: I'm behind you, no matter your choice.
attributes.name: Ailshie

attributes.content: Iâ€”
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: Take your time. You always make the right decision.
attributes.name: Ailshie

attributes.content: Miss... permit me walk around this garden, one last time.
attributes.name: Ailshie

attributes.content: It's most dear to me... even if it's just a shadow of its former self.
attributes.name: Ailshie

attributes.content: Allerdale wants to say something, but does not open her mouth.

She watches someone, with whom she has spent virtually every day of her entire life, walk towards the center of the garden. They have been through the worst of times together, and have been transformed them in ways they could not have imagined.
Allerdale realizes that she has not seen Ailshie smile like this for years.
She feels a sense of tranquility, one that she has not felt in ages.
If there is still a chanceâ€”
Suddenly, Allerdale's attention is drawn to a speck of orange in the distance.
It rapidly draws near, and she feels the temperature around her rise.
Ailshie! Quick, we mustâ€”
attributes.name: Allerdale

attributes.content: In an instant, the manor is engulfed in flames.
...Your Highness.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: Quiet.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: You're disturbing my enjoyment of the view.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Storied history turns to cinder. The proud manors of the nobles, reduced to charred ruins.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Tiles carefully sculpted and laid over centuries peel off one by one. Flowers collected from all the corners of the land wilt and wither.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: My orders were to investigate the nobles.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: Are you not happy with what I'm doing, 'Commander'?
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: Do you not enjoy the flames? Does the sound of blood evaporating not interest you?
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: 'Hiss, hiss.' Listen and savor, Lettou, my friend.
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: I'm examining every drop of blood, as is my responsibility...
attributes.name: Sanguinarch of Vampires

attributes.content: I will assist your investigation, ensuring that no... traitor... walks free.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou

attributes.content: As is my duty.
attributes.name: Lt. Colonel Lettou
